short_summary: This is an Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) for high-energy X-ray systems for safe, radiographic inspection of vehicles and large conveyances. The objective is to establish a list of qualified respondents for future solicitations.
description: The objectives of this ITQ are to identify qualified suppliers of MI systems that meet the long-term needs of CBSA. The ITQ will provide an opportunity for the selected suppliers to participate in future solicitations for contracts, standing offers and/or supply arrangements for MI systems for the safe, radiographic inspection of vehicles and large conveyances. The ITQ will be a recurring event, and prospective suppliers are encouraged to register their interest to participate in future ITQs.

**Government Tender Announcement**
-------------------------------

**Document Number:** WS3712174807-Doc3754743406

**Amendment Number:** 2

**Publication Date:** November 17, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** December 16, 2022, 14:00 EST

**Amendment Date:** December 14, 2022

**Expected Contract Start Date:** December 1, 2023

**Expected Contract End Date:** December 31, 2030

**Tender Status:** Cancelled

**Goods and Services:**

The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) is conducting an Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) to create a list of Qualified Respondents (QR) for the procurement of Mobile Imaging (MI) systems for the safe, radiographic inspection of vehicles and large conveyances. The requirement is for high-energy x-ray systems mounted on compliant vehicles.

The MI systems are subdivided into two streams:

* Stream 1: Medium-Scale MI Systems (200+ mm of steel penetration, vehicle mass approximately 14,000 kg)
* Stream 2: Large Scale MI Systems (300+ mm of steel penetration, vehicle mass approximately 26,000 kg)

**Trade Agreements:**

This ITQ is open to bidders who have a trade agreement with Canada, including but not limited to:

* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**Contracting Entity:**

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) / Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
